text: March 0, although a nonexistent date, is often another name for the leap day February 29. People who were born on a leap day can celebrate their birthday on "March 0", but this date is technically either February 28 or March 1. It can also be used in software programs. It can be represented as 00/03/yyyy, 03/00/yyyy or yyyy/03/00. Category:Days of the year
title: March 0
